feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 7:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Snow at times heavy over southern sections this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
